properties.areaDesc: Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Grande Ronde Valley; Northwest Blue Mountains; Wallowa County; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 8 at 7:34PM PST until January 11 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...Heavy snow expected Friday morning through Saturday...

.A series of disturbances will impact the Pacific Northwest
beginning Friday morning bringing heavy snow to the Cascades and
Blue/Wallowa Mountains. At this time the heaviest snow looks to
fall Friday afternoon through Saturday morning before gradually
decreasing Saturday afternoon.

* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to
12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. In Oregon,
Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon, Southern Blue Mountains of
Oregon, Grande Ronde Valley and Wallowa County.

* WHEN...From Friday morning through Saturday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON
